units.delegate_conversations: Delegate your WhatsApp conversations to AI and save time for your team.
units.credit_explanation: Each message processed by the AI agent consumes 1 credit. Top up your balance to continue using the service.

chat.delegate_conversations: Monitor in real-time the conversations handled by Findora's AI agent.

config.configure_your_ai_agent: Configure your AI agent to suit your needs and ambitions.

info.goal_placeholder: Define the main role of your agent.
info.Professionnel_description: A formal and structured tone, ideal for B2B interactions and corporate communications. The agent responds with precision and clarity.
info.Concise_description: Short and direct responses, perfect for users seeking quick and efficient information.
info.Amical_description: A warm and engaging tone, suitable for informal interactions and customer relations.
info.customer_support_description: Answers customer questions and provides effective assistance.
info.sales_closing_description: Helps convert prospects into customers and optimizes sales.
info.internal_description: Supports internal teams with tailored responses and resources.
info.fill_all_fields: Please fill in all fields before saving.

token.title: Integrate Findora with your tools - CRM, SaaS, or custom platforms.
token.api_key_description: This key allows you to authenticate and perform actions. It is confidential and sensitive. Please do not share it or make it public.
token.api_key_usage_description: For all your API requests, you must include your authentication key in the headers of your requests. This allows you to perform secure actions on the API. Here is an example of how to add the key in the headers:
token.api_example: // Example of using the token in an API request in JavaScript
token.replace_api_key: Replace apiKey with your personal API key for each request.

whatsapp.title: Integrate Findora with your tools - CRM, SaaS, or custom platforms.
whatsapp.send_message: Send a message to one or more numbers
whatsapp.send_message_description: Allows sending a message to one or more phone numbers at once.
whatsapp.schedule_message_description: Allows scheduling the sending of a message for a later date.
whatsapp.get_scheduled_messages_description: Allows retrieving all scheduled messages for a later date.
whatsapp.delete_scheduled_message_description: Allows deleting a scheduled message for a later date.
whatsapp.api_usage_description: To avoid spam, we distribute the sending of messages on our server with spaced delays.

onboarding.contact_management_description: Efficiently organize and categorize all your WhatsApp contacts. Create custom groups to better target your communications.
onboarding.ai_agent_description: Automate your WhatsApp conversations with our intelligent AI agent. Provide 24/7 customer support without human intervention.
onboarding.whatsapp_marketing_description: Send targeted messages on a large scale for your marketing campaigns. Track performance and optimize your communications.
